telephony_alias_ovh_pabx_condition: To use this functionality, you must activate the interactive voice response type of the call queue type (expert mode).
telephony_alias_ovh_pabx_menu_condition: You must activate the interactive voice response in order to manage the interactive menus.
telephony_alias_ovh_pabx_tts_condition: You must activate the Contact Center Solution in expert mode in order to manage Text to Speech.
